mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{column} WHERE member_id LIKE #{action}
mapper.select: SELECT reservation.rsv_seq,reservation.host_serial,residence.residence_name ,reservation.checkin, reservation.checkout,m.name,m.member_id FROM reservation ,member m,residence WHERE reservation.member_id = m.member_id AND reservation.host_serial = residence.host_serial AND m.member_id = #{action}
